scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:base: npm run clean:allure && npm run cucumber -- --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --format-options "{\"resultsDir\":\"allure-results\"}"
scripts.test:api:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@api" && npm run report:allure
scripts.test:ui:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@ui" && npm run report:allure
scripts.test:all:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@api or @ui" && npm run report:allure
scripts.test:full:cycle: npm run generate:models && npm run test:all:qa
